entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
